data.text: @WilhelmScream13 I'm guessing the people who grab those items off the shelves and deliver them aren't operating on a volunteer pro-bono basis.
@aripari18 I placed on a $4 tip, but that still doesn't add up right. I didn't even notice. Fortunately I didn't order it, but I'm gonna have to check that out
@WilhelmScream13 The math doesn't add up. It should be 36.72, not 40. So, either this is fake or there is a hidden fee of $3.50.
@jdem_7 I pray to it on my Nancy Pelosi alter every night

@Vote_CNP @mastu52 I'm all the way up in Mendocino
It's so incredibly fucked up here
@WilhelmScream13 @mastu52 Our economic status quo will always seek to extract as much from you as it can.
